title: Margarine from oil
brief_description: A general account of the main states in the manufacture of margarine. Photographs of a creamery at work shows the following processes: weighing the correct proportions of oils; mixing the oils with other ingredients; churning, emulsifying, and cooling; kneading and packing the margarine.
